headline: Visa Extends Stablecoin Reach As It Seeks New Payment Flows
summary: Visa is expanding its stablecoin settlement program to over 50 countries, widening access to blockchain based payment options. The company is adding new advisory services around digital currencies for banks, fintechs, and merchants. Visa is partnering with Mercuryo for near real time crypto to fiat conversion through Visa Direct. A new partnership with Amenify aims to power card linked resident commerce and rewards across tens of millions of U.S. rental properties. Visa (NYSE:V) is pushing...

headline: Visa Shareholders Approve Directors, Pay Plan and Charter Amendments; Reject 4 Proposals at AGM
summary: Visa (NYSE:V) held its 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders virtually on January 27, with Board Chair John Lundgren opening the session and shareholders voting on eight proposals, including director elections, executive compensation, auditor ratification, and four shareholder-sponsored items.
